item.title: Iceland Day 2: Golden Circle & Snowmobiling
item.description: I grabbed an assortment of croissants from Brau√∞ & Co, half a block from our apartment. We were on the road headed East by 7:05AM. The morning was strikingly dark. Clouds obscured any starlight. A soft rain made everything reflective. Faint glimpses of small trees and twisted wooden branches looked like alien figures on the side of the road. I drove nervously, stooping over the wheel like my dad had the morning before.
